Name: Green Leaf Vegetable Amaranth
Vendor: Johnny's Selected Seeds, Evergreen Seeds (http://www.evergreenseeds.com), Corona Seeds (http://www.coronaseeds.com).
Characteristics: oval to heart-shaped leaves; deep green color.

Name: Kahlalu Leaf
Characteristics: 45-50 days, used like spinach, purple venation, adapts easily to most localities; endangered cultivar.

Name: Red Leaf Edible Amaranth
Characteristics: large green leaves with red stripes.

Name: White Leaf Edible Amaranth
Characteristics: dwarf type with light green leaves and stems which are very tender.
